name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

name: Chicken Stir-Fry
description: Quick and flavorful Asian-inspired dish made with chicken, vegetables, and a savory sauce.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Simple Italian salad featuring fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and balsamic glaze.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Classic Mexican dish made with seasoned beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and taco shells.

name: Vegetable Curry
description: Hearty vegetarian curry loaded with a variety of vegetables and aromatic spices.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Italian rice dish cooked with mushrooms, onions, white wine, and Parmesan cheese.
